name: Dubius
description: Dubius is characterized by its small stature and features a villainous demeanor that thrives on fear and deception.
memorable: Dubius excels at inducing fear and distrust, creating a tense atmosphere on the battlefield.
goals: To manipulate and frighten foes, sapping their morale in combat.
relations: Often serves more powerful fiends or dark entities, preying on the weak.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy locales where it can blend in and manipulate others.
strengths: Ability to instill fear and distrust, causing psychological disruption among enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and lacks exceptional physical combat abilities.
attacks: Doubt inflicts psychic damage by forcing opponents to confront their fears, while Loathing causes them to attack their allies.
most_powerful_ability: Memory of Shame frightens enemies if they begin their turn within range, creating a strong psychological effect.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to navigate in dim light, but possesses low passive perception.
skills: Despite its manipulative nature, its perception skill is poor with a -1 modifier.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage
Can communicate telepathically up to 120 feet
Affected by its own Memory of Shame when seeing its reflection
Specializes in creating tension and unease in combat
test_queries: fiend specialized in distrust and fear
creature that causes loathing among allies
